template.name: Trend Micro WFBS Status Report
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  trend_micro_data:
    custom_fields:
      - trend_micro_status
    filter:
      site__client: '{{ client.id }}'
    model: agent
    only:
      - hostname
      - site__client__name
      - site__name
      - last_seen
      - operating_system
report_run_timestamp: !now
